get.summary: Retrieves all travelExpenses of the logged in and company ID. By default only return active travels.

post.summary:
Creates a new travel based on the sent in DTO object, or import from existing external transactions.
            if "importExpenses" provides legal external transaction ids, these expenses will be imported from attexttrans table (external transactions) and add to the newly created travel.
            The expenses will be removed from attextrans and saved as new expenses in attdetails in one database transaction.

parameters.name: importExpenseIds
parameters.description: List of ids of the expenses to import, seperated by comma.

parameters.name: itemizeExpenses
parameters.description: Whether itemize expense types that can be itemized or not.

parameters.name: ignoreLimitWarnings
parameters.description: Ignore limit warnings and save the dto or give up on saving.

post.summary:
Import expenses from attexttrans table (external transactions) and append them to an existing travel.
            The expenses will be removed from attextrans and saved as new expenses in attdetails in one database transaction.

parameters.name: transactionNumber
parameters.description: The travel to import the expenses to

parameters.name: importExpenseIds
parameters.description: List of ids of the expenses to import, seperated by comma.

parameters.name: itemizeExpenses
parameters.description: Whether itemize expense types that can be itemized or not.

parameters.name: ignoreLimitWarnings
parameters.description: Ignore limit warnings and save the dto or give up on saving.

post.summary: Uploads a file to the document archive and adds the document to expense line's receipts.

get.summary: Retrieves travelExpense based on its ID and company ID

delete.summary: Deletes travelExpense based on its ID and company ID

patch.summary: Updates travelExpense based on its ID and company ID according to changes specified in patch document

delete.summary: Unlinks the receipt from the expense line.

parameters.name: transactionNumber
parameters.description: Transaction number of the travel expense

parameters.name: receiptId
parameters.description: The document id of the linked receipt

Unit4.BusinessWorld.PublicApi.LastUpdate.description: Date and user information about the lastest changes.

updatedAt.title: Updated
updatedAt.description:
Date and time for last changes.
                Readonly date
                Entity class: Date for last update
                Title: Updated
                Documentation: Date. The date the information in this window was last updated.

updatedBy.title: User ID
updatedBy.description:
The id or the user who did that last changes.
                Read only string
                Entity class: Operator's signature.DimValue (attribute_id = GN). The code entered in User master file that will
                make a user unique. The user's name as displayed on-screen, on reports and audit trails. Note that you cannot enter
                duplicate user IDs as these are validated
                Title: Updated by
                Documentation: Updated by. The user who last updated the information in this window.

Unit4.BusinessWorld.PublicApi.TravelExpe.title: Expense information
Unit4.BusinessWorld.PublicApi.TravelExpe.description: Expenses to be claimed. Can be related to travels.

travelRequestId.title: Travel request
travelRequestId.description:
Travel request.
            If this field is filled with a valid and approved travel request, data will be copied from the travel request to travel expense, along with its steps. In this case, any steps and expense lines provided in the CREATE dto will be neglected.
            If the travel request is invalid or not approved, CREATE will return 400 bad request.

expenseDate.description:
The expense date. Can be posted/patched for expense claims of type Expense Only,
                but will not have any effect for other expense types as they are
                governed by travel leg dates. When fetching an existing claim, the
                ExpenseDate will be set to the earliest leg date of the claim.

mealDeductionsAndLodgingPerDay.description: List of daily allowances. This should be connected to the leg.

workflowMessage.description: Rejected message which belongs to every line

accounting.description: Accounting information on the leg: Dim 1 - 7

originalExpenseType.title: Expense type 2
originalExpenseType.description: Original expense type. Used for itemization

accounting.description: Accounting fields including account, dim1-7, tax code, and tax system.

receipts.description: Receipts linked to this expense line.

workflowMessage.description: Rejected message for this expense line.

fileName.description: The file name (without the file extension).

mimeType.description:
The MIME type. Currently the following MIME types are supported:
            image/gif, image/jpeg, image/png, image/svg+xml, application/pdf

fileContent.description: The file content, encoded in Base64.

Unit4.BusinessWorld.PublicApi.TravelExpe.title: Daily allowance
Unit4.BusinessWorld.PublicApi.TravelExpe.description: MealDeduction and lodging information per day.
